name: Prohibition of distribution of medical cannabis and medical cannabis products to minors; penalties
text:
(a)  A person commits the offense of promoting medical cannabis or medical cannabis products to a minor if the person intentionally or knowingly distributes any amount of cannabis or manufactured cannabis products that came from a dispensary or production center to a minor who is not a registered qualifying patient.
     (b)  Any person who violates this section shall be guilty of a class B felony. [L 2015, c 241, pt of §2; am L 2017, c 170, §2]
 
Revision Note
 
  "Marijuana" changed to "cannabis" to conform to L 2017, c 170, pursuant to §23G-15.
